page.title: 20COMPANIES IN COBHAM SURREY
page.content: Three companies, {Logica, the Wellcome {Foundation and Sperry}, moved to Cobham recently. They all said that they chose Cobham for its good communications: the M25, the rail service, the A3 into London and its location between Heathrow and Gatwick. Sperry and Wellcome do a large proportion of their business abroad. Sperry and Logica are both involved in computers; Wellcome is a pharmaceutical company. Logica moved into Cobham Park. Wellcome plan to use the disused Schiff Home of Recovery. Wellcome chose this site, which is awaiting Government approval, out of 100 sites in the London area. Asked if they had any complaints about the area, they said it lacked good lunch facilities and accommodation for single people.
